attributes.action: Me and many more feel that Nigel Farage should be Knighted "Sir Nigel Farage"
attributes.background: Nigel Farage dedicated his 17 year political career to ensure that the UK left the EU. After being laughed at and ridiculed by many of his peers during his 17 years, he kept his dignity and his own counsel. Mr Farage eventually had the last laugh

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
